verses.verse: When Abram <S%H87><s%> was ninety <S%H8673><s%>- nine <S%H8672><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to Abram, <S%H87><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H410><s%> "I am God Almighty. <S%H7706><s%> Walk <S%H1980><s%> before me, <S%H6440><s%> and be blameless. <S%H8549><s%>
I will make <S%H5414><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> between me and you, <S%H7235><s%> and will multiply you exceedingly. <S%H3966><s%>"
Abram <S%H87><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on his face. <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> with him, <S%H559><s%> saying,
"As for me, <S%H589><s%> behold, <S%H1285><s%> my covenant is with you. <S%H1><s%> You will be the father of a multitude <S%H1995><s%> of nations. <S%H1471><s%>

Neither will your name <S%H8034><s%> any more be called <S%H7121><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> but your name <S%H8034><s%> will be Abraham; <S%H85><s%> for I have made you <S%H5414><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of a multitude <S%H1995><s%> of nations. <S%H1471><s%>
I will make <S%H6509><s%> you exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> of you. <S%H4428><s%> Kings will come out of you. <S%H3318><s%>

I will establish <S%H6965><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> between me and you and your seed <S%H2233><s%> after you <S%H310><s%> throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%> to be a God <S%H430><s%> to you and to your seed <S%H2233><s%> after you. <S%H310><s%>

I will give <S%H5414><s%> to you, <S%H2233><s%> and to your seed after you, <S%H310><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> where you are traveling, <S%H4033><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> possession. <S%H272><s%> I will be their God. <S%H430><s%>"

God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> "As for you, <S%H8104><s%> you will keep my covenant, <S%H1285><s%> you and your seed <S%H2233><s%> after you <S%H310><s%> throughout their generations. <S%H1755><s%>

This is my covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which you shall keep, <S%H8104><s%> between me and you <S%H310><s%> and your seed <S%H2233><s%> after you. <S%H310><s%> Every male among you shall be circumcised. <S%H4135><s%>
You shall be circumcised <S%H5243><s%> in the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your foreskin. <S%H6190><s%> It will be a token <S%H226><s%> of the covenant between me and you. <S%H1285><s%>

He who is eight <S%H8083><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> will be circumcised <S%H4135><s%> among you, <S%H2145><s%> every male throughout your generations, <S%H1755><s%> he who is born <S%H3211><s%> in the house, <S%H1004><s%> or bought <S%H4736><s%> with money <S%H3701><s%> from any foreigner <S%H1121><s%> who is not of your seed. <S%H2233><s%>

He who is born <S%H3211><s%> in your house, <S%H1004><s%> and he who is bought <S%H4736><s%> with your money, <S%H3701><s%> must <S%H4135><s%> be circumcised. <S%H4135><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> will be in your flesh <S%H1320><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

The uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is not circumcised <S%H4135><s%> in the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin, <S%H6190><s%> that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people. <S%H5971><s%> He has broken <S%H6565><s%> my covenant. <S%H1285><s%>"

God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> "As for Sarai <S%H8297><s%> your wife, <S%H802><s%> you shall not call <S%H7121><s%> her name <S%H8034><s%> Sarai, <S%H8297><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> her name <S%H8034><s%> will be Sarah. <S%H8283><s%>

I will bless <S%H1288><s%> her, <S%H5414><s%> and moreover I will give you a son <S%H1121><s%> by her. <S%H1288><s%> Yes, I will bless her, <S%H1471><s%> and she will be a mother of nations. Kings <S%H4428><s%> of peoples will come from her. <S%H5971><s%>"

Then Abraham <S%H85><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on his face, <S%H6440><s%> and laughed, <S%H6711><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> "Will a child be born <S%H3205><s%> to him who is one hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old? <S%H1121><s%> Will Sarah, <S%H8283><s%> who is ninety <S%H8673><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1323><s%> give birth? <S%H3205><s%>"
Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> "Oh that <S%H3863><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> might live <S%H2421><s%> before you! <S%H6440><s%>"

God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "No, <S%H61><s%> but Sarah, <S%H8283><s%> your wife, <S%H802><s%> will bear <S%H3205><s%> you a son. <S%H1121><s%> You shall call <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Isaac. <S%H3327><s%> I will establish <S%H6965><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> for his seed <S%H2233><s%> after him. <S%H310><s%>

As for Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> I have heard you. <S%H8085><s%> Behold, <S%H1288><s%> I have blessed him, <S%H6509><s%> and will make him fruitful, and will multiply <S%H7235><s%> him exceedingly. <S%H3966><s%> He will become the father <S%H3205><s%> of twelve <S%H6240><s%> princes, <S%H5387><s%> and I will make him <S%H5414><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%>

But my covenant <S%H1285><s%> I establish <S%H6965><s%> with Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> whom Sarah <S%H8283><s%> will bear <S%H3205><s%> to you at this set time <S%H4150><s%> next <S%H312><s%> year. <S%H8141><s%>"
When he finished <S%H3615><s%> talking <S%H1696><s%> with him, <S%H430><s%> God went up <S%H5927><s%> from Abraham. <S%H85><s%>

Abraham <S%H85><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> all who were born <S%H3211><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> and all who were bought <S%H4736><s%> with his money; <S%H3701><s%> every male <S%H2145><s%> among the men <S%H582><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> and circumcised <S%H4135><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of their foreskin <S%H6190><s%> in the same <S%H6106><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> as God <S%H430><s%> had said to him. <S%H1696><s%>
Abraham <S%H85><s%> was ninety <S%H8673><s%>- nine <S%H8672><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> when he was circumcised <S%H4135><s%> in the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin. <S%H6190><s%>

Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> was thirteen <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he was circumcised <S%H4135><s%> in the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin. <S%H6190><s%>
In the same <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> both Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> were circumcised. <S%H4135><s%>

All the men <S%H582><s%> of his house, <S%H1004><s%> those born <S%H3211><s%> in the house, <S%H1004><s%> and those bought <S%H4736><s%> with money <S%H3701><s%> of a foreigner, <S%H1121><s%> were circumcised with him. <S%H4135><s%>
